resources.string: The app has no permission to access the camera. Please choose allow in the following permission dialog.

This app needs to be used in conjunction with https://quietticket.com. Please note that QuietTicket is a product and trademark of Setarit.

The source code of this app is freely available at https://github.com/Setarit/QuietTicketScanner

More products and info can be found at http://setarit.com
The app has no permission to read from the storage. Please restart the app and allow storage access
The ticket has already been scanned
